goals__remit:
Deutsche Telekom AG is a leading integrated telecom operator with 216.000 employees worldwide. Deutsche Telekom is active in the fields of telecommunication, information technology, multimedia, entertainment as well as cloud and security solutions. Deutsche Telekom is present in nearly all European countries as an operator of fixed and wireless communication infrastructures and as a provider of communication technology for large private and public clients. The following network operators are forming parts of Deutsche Telekom Group in member states of the European Union: 
 
Deutsche Telekom AG,  
Magyar Telekom NyRt. (Hungary), 
OTE (Hellenic Telecommunications Organization S.A.) and Cosmote Mobile Telecommunications S.A. (both Greece), 
T-Mobile Polska S.A., 
Telekom Romania S.A., 
Slovak Telekom a.s., 
Hrvatski Telekom d.d. (Croatia), 
T-Mobile Austria GmbH, 
T-Mobile Czech Republic a.s. and 
T-Mobile Netherlands BV 
GTS Central Europe Gruppe (GTS)  
 
 
Outside Europe Deutsche Telekom is major shareholder in T-Mobile US Inc. 
 
The Brussels Representation of Deutsche Telekom is participating in all policy developments related to electronic communications and the data economy, contributing the expertise of Deutsche Telekom Group to the European debate on all aspects of the changing digital information society and the Digital Single Market. Our contributions cover the conditions for investment and innovation, the competitiveness of EU businesses and ICT experience of its consumers as well as corporate responsibility. These contributions intend to help Europe to keep its leading role in the area of network security, data privacy, data economy and connected cars , to fully exploit the potential of electronic communications and to maintain Europe’s competitive position in the global economy.
